altername_name: Mitsumega Toohru: The Three-Eyed One Comes Here
name: Mitsume ga tooru
overview: Mitsume ga Tooru is a video game for the MSX released by Natsume. It is based on the manga and anime called The Three-Eyed One. This is an action-adventure game in which you control Hosuke Sharaku, the mysterious three-eyed boy, as he searches for his missing girlfriend, Watosan. The game has a total of 5 stages, each of which requires you to search for information and clues that might help lead you to your next big break in the case. Once you've pieced together the puzzles that each stage has to offer, you'll face off against a huge boss enemy. Defeat this boss, and the story will automatically progress, taking you to the next stage to see how the adventure continues.
